targets.query: SELECT "max" FROM $database WHERE ("request" != 'allRequests') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request"
SELECT "max" FROM $database WHERE ("request" != 'allRequests') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "request"
SELECT sum("count") FROM $database WHERE ("status" != 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "status"
SELECT sum("count") FROM $database WHERE ("status" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM $database WHERE ("status" != 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "status"
SELECT mean("count") FROM $database WHERE ("request" =~ /^$request$/ AND "status" != 'ko' AND "test" =~ /^$test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES ON $database WITH KEY = "request" WHERE  "test" =~ /^$test$/ AND "request" != 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'all'
